plot outline: A thief with a golden heart, Jani becomes the trusted confidante of an MLA after helping him during a dangerous situation. He becomes fond of Jani to the extent of lending his daughter's hand in marriage to him until the day he unfortunately dies much to the surprise of Jani and his daughter. Jani is already in love with another woman and now finds himself in a messy situation to fulfill the late MLA's wish to marry his grief stricken daughter or marry the woman he actually loves.
title: Jani
plot: A thief with a golden heart, _Jani_ (qv) becomes the trusted confidante of an MLA after helping him during a dangerous situation. He becomes fond of _Jani_ (qv) to the extent of lending his daughter's hand in marriage to him until the day he unfortunately dies much to the surprise of _Jani_ (qv) and his daughter. _Jani_ (qv) is already in love with another woman and now finds himself in a messy situation to fulfill the late MLA's wish to marry his grief stricken daughter or marry the woman he actually loves.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
